description: It was not just breaching Covid rules that did for Hungarian Jozsef Szajer but claims of hypocrisy too.
title: How a lockdown 'sex party' doomed a Hungarian Euro MP
title_page: How a lockdown 'sex party' doomed a Hungarian Euro MP - BBC News
maintext: So while it was hard to find any censorious note in Western European coverage of the affair as it related to the private lives of the party guests, even Mr Manzheley's protestation that he had nurses at the party to provide rapid tests for Covid-19 didn't spare him from criticism for breaching public health guidelines.
